Articles.Content:
This is the page for the KSS Ares Space Station By The Rocketry Company Phoenix Industrial. Please visit my page via my signature to check out my other crafts.

The KSS Ares:

This is the KSS Ares with its 2 base modules here. This is it in its base residential form More Modules Will Be Added with scientific equiptment.

The KSS Ares has had its secondary power module added with 2 gigantor arrays and a full flt tank! So now there is fuel up there too! Scientific equiptment has also been added so I shall begin to add fuel to the station.

Please subscribe to see other updates to this craft.

Edited July 29, 2013 by Affan
Shouldn't this be in mission reports? I'd think it'd be a better place.
I would've thought that mission report would be for, say, missions to the mun and back, you know, missions which terminate at some points? Am I mistaken?
Not necessarily, you'll be building this station up in this thread, thus mission reports
I suppose I'll move it there now, thanks for clearing it up for me
hey please could you tell me how to delete my thread?
